â€œLove it for its body buzz/pain relief and uplifting, clear head buzz. Great buds, greens and orange hairs covered in chromes. Very dense and sticky, little goes a long way, buz lasts for a little bit too but is so mellow you can study or hit the gym no problem for me. An over all great strain, Will be getting more asap, didn't know it was gonna be this good.â€

â€œYou know how all these reviews say it's super happy and social and uplifting? It really, really is. This happened last night:
